feed.title: Activepieces Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.32.3
entry.content:
üß© Pieces

  • feat(upgrade.chat): create invoice, get contact detail, create product, including more 3 actions and 3 triggers (#5640) @OmarSayed
  • feat(linka): create invoice, get contact detail, create product, including more 3 actions and 3 triggers (#5639) @OmarSayed

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: steps logos looked squished in run details (#5659) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: SSO sign ups used to fail if the user doesn't have a first or last name (#5659) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: Show publish button inside builder for Operator users (#5659) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: project switcher search wasn't working (#5656) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: allow replacing empty steps from previous UI (#5649) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • docs: add OmarSayed as a contributor for plugin (#5652) @allcontributors

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @OmarSayed, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @anasbarg and @kishanprmr

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.32.4
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • fix: add AI providers page to platform admin to configure universal AI providers (#5673) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • feat: improve piece selector experience (#5669) @cezudas

üß© Pieces

  • fix(google-sheeet): fix clear sheet action (#5668) @kishanprmr
  • feat(dust): allow creation of empty conversations (#5690) @AdamSelene
  • feat(github): use octokit sdk for actions and triggers (#5681) @AdamSelene
  • feat(aianswer): schedule call, get call details ,transcript call data and other 3 actions (#5618) @drona2938
  • feat(dust): improve error messages shown to users (#5688) @AdamSelene
  • feat(nifty): add description field for create task action (#5672) @wise-introvert
  • feat(intercom): add conversation.rated trigger (#5677) @AdamSelene
  • feat(github): add octokit sdk and raw graphql action (#5675) @AdamSelene

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: stop activating dragging step on holding space (#5683) @rSnapkoOpenOps
  • fix: SSO login (#5663) @abuaboud

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @AdamSelene, @abuaboud, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @anasbarg, @cezudas, @drona2938, @kamal, @kishanprmr, @rSnapkoOpenOps and @wise-introvert

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.33.0
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat: add list contains operator (#5666) @kamal
  • fix: store all action / trigger files into file storage (s3 / db) (#5700) @abuaboud

üß© Pieces

  • feat(youtube): Custom API Call Action (#4611) @kishanprmr
  • feat(customer-io): add support for EU workspaces (#5719) @AdamSelene
  • feat: support large file upload for onedrive (#5662) @ikus060
  • feat(Activepieces): add base url and api key secret (#5712) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • feat(image-ai): create image action (#5653) @kishanprmr
  • feat(text-helper): add slugify action (#5709) @AdamSelene
  • feat(github): add trigger on new push (#5704) @AdamSelene
  • feat(odoo): custom create and update actions for models (#5651) @ahronshor
  • feat(text-ai): add prompt field (#5646) @kishanprmr
  • feat(google-contacts): search contacts and update contact actions (#5671) @ikus060

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: handle case when input.auth is undefined (#5718) @kamal
  • fix: move invalid code template to local variable (#5717) @abuaboud
  • fix: validate dynamic properties in step settings (#5682) @rSnapkoOpenOps
  • fix: allow context.run.stop() to be called without params (#5670) @kamal
  • fix: logging utils (#5708) @abuaboud
  • feat(auth): logout all active sessions when user resets password (#5679) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: ui crash on clickup multi dropdown (#5703) @abuaboud
  • fix: increase timeout to 15 minutes (#5701) @abuaboud
  • fix: remove gap in piece search (#5699) @abuaboud
  • fix: validate storage keys (#5698) @abuaboud
  • fix: match isolated-vm version (#5694) @abuaboud
  • fix: iterations should not show up (#5693) @abuaboud
  • fix: project settings not visible on mobile (#5661) @kamal

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • feat(sdk): enhance pieces filteration & email is optional & secure token exchange (#5722) @abuaboud
  • feat: enhance piece selector suggestions (#5720) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • feat: add icons before file/date inputs to indicate what they are (#5697) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üìö Documentation

  • docs: add ahronshor as a contributor for plugin (#5702) @allcontributors
  • docs: Rename AP_RESIS_DB to AP_REDIS_DB (#5676) @janwytze

üßπ Maintenance & Dev Experience

  • fix: tests in the engine (#5705) @abuaboud
  • chore(deps-dev): bump vite from 5.4.0 to 5.4.7 (#5680) @dependabot
  • chore(deps): bump find-my-way and fastify (#5650) @dependabot

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @AdamSelene, @abuaboud, @ahronshor, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @anasbarg, @dependabot, @hazemadelkhalel, @ikus060, @janwytze, @kamal, @kishanprmr and @rSnapkoOpenOps

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.34.0
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat: add replicate provider (text & image models) (#5777) @anasbarg
  • feat: premium pieces are now open source (#5741) @abuaboud

üß© Pieces

  • feat(slack): new mention trigger (#5787) @kishanprmr
  • feat(pdf): revamp extract text / add pdf to images (#5783) @abuaboud
  • feat(slack): update custom slack channel ID instruction and ignore bot message option for trigger (#5757) @geekyme-fsmk
  • chore: remove non-llm models and use max_completion_tokens (#5767) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: Youtube & Google search console authentication instructions (#5768) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix(date-helper): extend dayjs with advancedFormat to support X format (#5746) @kamal
  • fix(date-helper): convert to use dayjs (#5740) @abuaboud
  • fix(airtable): fix multiselect field causing overwriting of existing values (#5725) @kishanprmr

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: update role when switching project (#5788) @abuaboud
  • fix: long step name label overlapping the step node (#5779) @kamal
  • fix: symlink permissions error on windows (#5769) @HoldYourWaffle
  • fix: send edition with apps (#5772) @abuaboud
  • fix: initial values (#5761) @abuaboud
  • fix: straighten startup ascii art (#5762) @HoldYourWaffle
  • fix: force path style (#5755) @abuaboud
  • fix: openai 401 caused by duplicate auth headers (#5751) @anasbarg
  • fix: steps being invalid when they are not (#5752) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: filter out headers forbidden by undici http client (#5745) @anasbarg
  • fix: host url in ee edition (#5739) @abuaboud
  • fix: improve user journey in platform admin to embed builder (#5728) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: generate source map for backend (#5735) @abuaboud
  • fix: hide npm if they are not allowed (#5733) @abuaboud
  • fix: rate limit per project is not based on ids not counter to be error bullet proof (#5726) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: project route redirect not preserving query params (#5731) @kamal
  • fix: tab order of the sign in field (#5732) @kamal
  • fix: tasks count during test flow (#5730) @abuaboud
  • fix: import flows inside builders now overwrites current flow (#5724) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • fix: add missing spacing in the signing key dialog (#5780) @kamal
  • feat(s3): make signed urls optional (#5758) @abuaboud

üìö Documentation

  • docs: add geekyme-fsmk as a contributor for plugin (#5782) @allcontributors
  • docs: add cezudas as a contributor for bug (#5781) @allcontributors
  • docs: add on-call schedule (#5738) @abuaboud

üßπ Maintenance & Dev Experience

  • feat(pdf): remove convert pdf to image / revamp extract text (#5785) @abuaboud
  • fix: uncontrolled to controlled input warning in SignInForm component (#5775) @cezudas
  • chore: security upgrade @sentry/node from 7.64.0 to 7.75.0 (#5771) @abuaboud
  • fix: dev setup on windows (#5763) @HoldYourWaffle
  • chore: Security upgrade @activepieces/pieces-common from 0.2.15 to 0.2.16 (#5748) @abuaboud
  • chore: Security upgrade node from 18.19-bullseye-slim to 18.20.4-bullseye-slim (#5747) @abuaboud
  • chore: add sentry error handler to ai proxy (#5743) @anasbarg
  • chore: remove references to deprecated AP_WEBHOOK_URL (#5734) @kamal

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @HoldYourWaffle, @abuaboud, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @anasbarg, @cezudas, @geekyme-fsmk, @hazemadelkhalel, @kamal, @kishanprmr and @snyk-bot

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.34.1
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat: chat trigger and action (#5803) @anasbarg

üß© Pieces

  • fix(image-ai): add prompt guide (#5804) @abuaboud
  • feat(image-ai): extract structured data from image (#5793) @kishanprmr
  • fix(slack): fix new mention trigger test (#5792) @kishanprmr

üõ†Ô∏è Piece Framework

  • feat: allow file property inside array (#5800) @abuaboud

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix(engine): apply error handling & retries on files service (#5807) @abuaboud
  • fix: store large sample data (#5791) @abuaboud
  • fix(array-property): append on array of object makes data disappear (#5802) @abuaboud
  • fix: provision pending user invitation on sign (#5798) @abuaboud
  • fix: anthropic auth header (#5797) @anasbarg
  • fix: show non-empty page on approval (#5794) @geekyme

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • feat: allow users to manipulate store entries via the API (#5796) @kamal

üìö Documentation

  • docs: add geekyme as a contributor for plugin (#5795) @allcontributors

üßπ Maintenance & Dev Experience

  • refactor: minor clean up for list runs endpoint (#5801) @abuaboud

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@abuaboud, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @anasbarg, @geekyme, @kamal and @kishanprmr
